Vuepress-Decap-Netlify

A Vuepress boilerplate integrated with Decap CMS hosted on Netlify

Set up this template

This template is built on VuePress, allow access and editing via DecapCMS, and is hosted on Netlify.
"Songs?" you wonder... The author uses songs (as an example of content)
To use the CMS, set up this template, head to /admin/ path on your site, and login.
Otherwise, get a feel of the CMS here.
